channel.title: Compilin error sorry its not in the FAQ one
channel.description:
since no one looks at this in FAQ I need help with this..
I have this error when i click compile: The System cannot find path specified.
yet I have this for the compiler code. [code]@echo off title Compiler "C:/Program Files/Java\jdk1.6.0_21/bin/javac.exe" -d ./bin ./src/*.java pause[/code]
and for java these are the exact things I have: java(TM)6 Update 20 and Java(TM)SE Development Kit 6 Update 20 If anyone can help I'd gladly appreciate it.

program Files (x86) I believe.

Than why is the path set to Program Files? There is a pink mushy thing between your ears, use it.
